capabilities.description: Whether a phone number has mms, sms, or voice capability

categorised_greetings_with_sub_settings.description: The id and any settings associated with each greeting category. If the category has no settings, it defaults to the category name

country_code.description: The ISO code of the country for this number

created_at.description: The date and time the phone number was created

default_greeting_ids.description: The names of default system greetings associated with the phone number

default_group_id.description: Default group id. *Writeable on most of the plans.

group_ids.description: An array of associated groups. *Writeable on most of plans.

location.description: The number's geographical location. For example, "CA" or "Leeds"

name.description: The nickname if one is set. Otherwise the display_number

nickname.description: The nickname of the number if one is set

recorded.description: Whether calls for the number are recorded or not

sms_group_id.description: The group associated with this phone number

token.description: A generated token, unique for each phone number and used when provisioning the number. *Writeable on create only.

toll_free.description: Whether the number is toll-free or local

transcription.description: Whether calls for the number are transcribed or not
